name: Worthless billions: One more asshole to the pile.
description: A record number of billionaires, about one new one every 17 hours, have been created during the COVID-19 pandemic, worth a total of US$13.1 trillion, up from US$8 trillion in 2020. The worldâ€™s 10 richest people are now worth a combined total of US$1.2 trillion, having grown their fortunes by around 66% over the past 12 months. A total of 86% of billionaires are richer than they were a year ago, the absurdity of our reality amid surging poverty. 1080px / 24FPS / Original audio.
